name: TaraClass
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tara class
Developer Terms of Use
des: Tara Class: A suite of comprehensive, virtual-voice courses designed by experts that guarantee improved proficiency and results. With courses tailored specifically for everyone, Tara Class allows learners to learn spoken English and other academic subjects with complete flexibility and convenience. Courses are designed for all types of learners - beginning proficiency, limited proficiency, and basic proficiency. Sign-up is quick and easy. 24/7 support. Tara Class is the new way to learn!
